characterDescription:
Yelig-nar is one of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar. Also known as Blightwind, Yelig-nar was referenced in one of Dalinar's visions, when he met with Nohadon. (Yelig-nar had broken into Nohadon's chancery and slaughtered all of Nohadon's wordsmen.)
Elhokar believes that this 'dark spren' is responsible for giving the actual order issued by his wife, Aesudan, for the condemnation of an ardent to death. That is, this dark spren that is controlling the palace in Kholinar.
In her madness while Queen of Alethkar, Aesudan bonded with Yelig-nar, who took over her persona ... and appearance.

characterDetails.Appearance: Yelig-nar is a smoky, shadowy spren. It can be seen at the Battle of Thaylen Field.
characterDetails.Characteristics: When Yelig-nar consumes someone, he does so entirely, like Nightblood.
characterDetails.Notes: Brandon has confirmed that the Unmade are Splinters of Odium. Odium splintered himself and created the Unmade to be his influence on Roshar. It is through the Unmade that Odium may be able to influence people in how they think or act.
